Location

Venue

The tournament is held at River Pool & Sports Bar, located at 19 NW 5th Ave, Downtown Portland.
Pool is always FREE at River — first come, first served for practice before the tournament.

Getting Here

MAX Light Rail

Two stations nearby make arriving by MAX simple:

  • NW 5th & Couch: Green, Orange, Yellow MAX; Blue and Yellow buses
  • NW 6th & Davis: Green, Orange, Yellow MAX; Blue and Yellow buses

View the TriMet MAX system map

Live Arrival Times:

  • NW 5th & Couch — Stop ID 8379
  • NW 6th & Davis — Stop ID 8384

Parking Options

On-street metered parking is available nearby. Always check signs for hours and payment info.

SmartPark Garages: City-run garages nearby. View locations.

Private lots and garages are within walking distance.

Other Ways to Get Here

Lime Scooters: Use the Lime app to find one nearby.

Uber & Lyft: Both apps recognize River Pool & Sports Bar as a destination.
